nodes.body: {üñº showcase} [Meepalasheep](https://www.youtube.com/@Meepalasheep) released [a trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=02iEtbYowtg) for their upcoming platformer double feature, GingerSnap!

{üéÆ releases} [v0.14](https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2020460/view/6002801934194460190?l=english) of [Bring It On!](https://bringiton.axolstudio.com/) was released which adds **Level 7: The Icy Tundra** to the game (along with more characters, weapons, and items!)

{!header} It's a new year! New Games! We had a bunch of games that were made last year - and even more made this last weekend at the Global Game Jam!

Want to participate in a Game Jam or hang out with others in the community? Keep your eyes on the Roundup for announcements about upcoming Game Jams and other events in our area!

{ üêá2024 Games! } Here's a look back at all the games that were made by members of our community in 2023!

- Carol Mertz & Rob Santos 
 - [The Art Handler](https://artsandculture.google.com/experiment/the-art-handler/zAGDpcg-fq-0dw?hl=en)

{ ü§π‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Global Game Jam 2024 } The 2024 Global Game Jam was January 26-28 at Washington University, St Louis.
The theme was "Make Me Laugh"
There were 19(!) games made at our location over the course of the jam!
Check them all out:

- [Catapult Categories](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/catapult-categories-6)
- [The Situation is Grim](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/situation-grim-3)
- [Sidewinder](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/slidewinder-6)
- [HaPotato!](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/hapotato-1)
- [Heavy Laugh](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/heavy-laugh-6)
- [Ratamari](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/ratamari-1)
- [JokeBox](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/jokebox-5)
- [Typing of the Beans](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/typing-beans-5)
- [Only Me](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/only-me-7)
- [Ship of Fools](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/ship-fools-8)
- [Cat Nap](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/cat-nap-0)
- [My King was in Mourning. So I Recruited the Kingdom's Funniest Jester to Cheer Him Up](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/my-king-was-mourning-so-i-recruited-kingdoms-funniest-jester-cheer-him-7)
- [Hilarious Hijinks: a tale in cards](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/hilarious-hijinks-tale-cards-2)
- [Capitalism Carnival](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/capitalism-carnival-3)
- [The Best Medicine](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/best-medicine-6)
- [The Friendship of Percival](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/friendship-percival-7)
- [Student Simulator](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/student-simulator-2)
- [Tickle Monster](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/tickle-monster-7-0)
- [Cat Game](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/cat-game-6)

Great job to everyone who participated!
